snippet: In an apparent bureaucratic mix-up, Moroccan officials released 30 inmates meant to serve out their sentences in Spain.
abstract: Moroccan officials, in apparent bureaucratic mix-up, pardon 48 Spanish prisoners, including man convicted of raping children; had previously been asked by Spain to pardon 18 Spaniards convicted in Morocco and let 30 others return to serve out their prison terms; episode embarrasses both nations, prompting rare protests in Morocco and ultimately successful scramble to find freed pedophile.
lead_paragraph: In an apparent bureaucratic mix-up, Moroccan officials released 30 inmates meant to serve out their sentences in Spain.

headline.main: Spanish Pedophile Arrested After a Mistaken Pardon
headline.print_headline: Spanish Pedophile Arrested After a Mistaken Pardon

keywords.value: Juan Carlos I, King of Spain
keywords.name: persons
